## ZCurve.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `ZCurve` class

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(dim: T, bits: Range1_32, order?: ArrayLike<RangeValueMap[T]>);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  dim | <code>T</code> | dimensions |
|  bits | <code>Range1_32</code> | number of bits per component |
|  order | <code>ArrayLike&lt;RangeValueMap[T]&gt;</code> | component ordering |
